## Configuring and Loading Packages

This dialog allows to easily load/unload multiple packages simultaneously.

![Menu Settings - Load/Unload Packages](images/menu_settings/menu_settings_load_pkgs.png)

Thousands of add-on packages can be downloaded for R. RKWard offers a graphical interface
to browse, install, and update such packages.
